CustomField.formula: CASE(EBH_Stage__c, 'Closed Lost', 0, 'Open', 0.1, 'New Project', 0.1, 'Engaged', 0.2, 'Contacted', 0.2, 'Proposal Created', 0.3, 'Pitched', 0.4, 'Negotiate and Close', 0.5, 'Negotiation', 0.5, 'On Hold', 0.5, 'Paused', 0.5, 'Paused during Integration', 0.5, 'Paused After Going Live', 0.5, 'Pre - Integration', 0.7, 'Integration', 0.8, 'Store Launched', 0.9, 'Live to Site', 1, 0)
CustomField.label: Probability (%)
